predictions.text: The Bank of Japan will raise its short-term policy rate target by at least 0.10 percentage point at its December 2025 monetary policy meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official BoJ Monetary Policy Meeting statement shows the uncollateralized overnight call rate target increased by ≥0.10 percentage point versus the prior target.
monitoring_signals: USD/JPY spot moves and implied vols
BoJ member speeches and local press leaks
predictions.rationale: BoJ communications turned more hawkish amid above-target inflation and wage gains, pushing markets to price a non-trivial chance of a December move.

predictions.text: U.S. International Trade Balance (goods and services) for October 2025 will print between -$76.0B and -$84.0B.
predictions.verification_criteria: BEA/Census joint release for “U.S. International Trade in Goods and Services, October 2025” shows the seasonally adjusted headline deficit within the stated range.
predictions.rationale: Dollar strength and resilient domestic demand support a wider deficit; tariff timing and softer global demand weigh on exports.

predictions.text: ISM Services (Non-Manufacturing) New Orders Index for November 2025 will print between 51.0 and 56.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management’s November 2025 Services Report on Business lists the New Orders Index value within the stated interval.
monitoring_signals: S&P Global US Services PMI new orders
Retailer and logistics commentary on holiday demand
predictions.rationale: Holiday-demand support and stable services activity point to modest expansion in new orders rather than a surge.

predictions.text: Google will publish a Chrome Stable Channel update in December 2025 acknowledging at least one CVE as 'exploited in the wild.'
predictions.verification_criteria: A Chrome Releases blog post for a Stable Channel update in December 2025 contains language that Google is aware of an in-the-wild exploit for a listed CVE.
monitoring_signals: Chrome Releases RSS and security advisories
Threat intel reports of active browser exploits
predictions.rationale: Chrome has multiple in-the-wild disclosures annually; year-end cycles often include emergency patches.

predictions.text: BTC/USD spot will trade at or below $56,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable aggregator (e.g., CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko) or major exchange trade data shows a daily low ≤ $56,000 on a UTC day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Perpetual futures funding and open interest
Options skew/IV and dealer gamma positioning
Stablecoin net flows and on-chain liquidity
predictions.rationale: Enforcement headlines and fragile risk sentiment into year-end elevate downside tails.

predictions.text: GIE AGSI+ will show EU-27 natural gas storage fill at or above 75.0% on 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: AGSI+ daily data for EU-27 aggregate on 2025-12-31 shows storage level percentage ≥ 75.0%.
monitoring_signals: LNG send-out and regas capacity utilization
TTF price and forward curve changes
predictions.rationale: High opening inventories, steady LNG and relatively mild early winter reduce drawdown risk below 75% by year-end.

predictions.text: In at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report released by 2025-12-31, U.S. distillate fuel oil stocks will increase by at least 3.0 million barrels week-over-week.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report shows the week-over-week change in Distillate Fuel Oil Stocks ≥ +3.0 million barrels in any December 2025 report.
predictions.rationale: Warm spells and high refinery runs can produce outsized weekly builds even during winter.

predictions.text: Copernicus C3S will report November 2025 as the warmest November on record globally.
predictions.verification_criteria: Copernicus Climate Change Service monthly climate bulletin states that November 2025 was the warmest November on record globally.
monitoring_signals: NOAA and Berkeley Earth preliminary estimates
predictions.rationale: Record warmth has persisted; ocean heat content and lingering anomalies support a new November record.

predictions.text: OFAC will designate at least one cryptocurrency mixer or centralized exchange for sanctions (added to the SDN List) by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A U.S. Treasury (OFAC) press release adds at least one named crypto mixer or exchange to the SDN List between 2025-12-02 and 2025-12-31 UTC.
monitoring_signals: Blockchain analytics reports on illicit flows
predictions.rationale: Coordinated pressure on illicit crypto finance increases the likelihood of year-end sanctions actions.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS10 or Treasury official close shows a daily close ≤ 3.95% on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: Term premium measures and auction demand
predictions.rationale: Soft inflation and a dovish-leaning Fed into year-end can compress term yields.

predictions.text: Germany Factory Orders (October 2025, MoM, seasonally and calendar adjusted) will print between -1.0% and +1.0%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Destatis press release for October 2025 new orders in manufacturing (seasonally and calendar adjusted, MoM) falls within -1.0% to +1.0%.
monitoring_signals: Germany and euro area PMI new orders
predictions.rationale: Indicators point to stabilization without a strong rebound; a flat-ish monthly print is likely.

predictions.text: At the December 2025 FOMC meeting, the SEP median projection for 2026 Core PCE inflation will be between 2.2% and 2.6%.
predictions.verification_criteria: The Summary of Economic Projections table released after the December 2025 FOMC meeting shows the median 2026 Core PCE inflation projection within the stated range.
monitoring_signals: Recent core PCE/CPI trends and revisions
predictions.rationale: Decelerating inflation and anchored expectations point to a mid-2s median for 2026 core PCE.

predictions.text: EIA's U.S. regular gasoline (all formulations) weekly retail price will be at or below $3.10 per gallon in the week of 2025-12-29.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Gasoline and Diesel Fuel Update for the 2025-12-30 publication (week of 2025-12-29) shows the national U.S. regular grade price ≤ $3.10/gal.
monitoring_signals: EIA motor gasoline stocks and product supplied
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand fade and softer cracks into late December typically pressure pump prices lower.
